    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Konveksna zrcala, gorišče, krivinski polmer</string>
            <string language="en">Convex Mirrors, Focal Point, and Radius of Curvature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvexe Spiegel, Schwerpunkt und Radius Biegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Miroirs convexes, point focal, et rayon de 
courbure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espelhos convexos, ponto focal, e raio da 
curvatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Specchi convessi, punto focale e raggio di 
curvatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυρτοί καθρέφτες, σημείο εστίασης, και ακτίνα της 
κυρτότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espejos convexos, punto focal, y radio de 
curvatura</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Določanje gorišča ukrivljenega zrcala s pomočjo vzporednih žarkov, slike predmeta, ...</string>
            <string language="en">Determining the focal point of a curved mirror with the use of parallel rays and object's image.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ukrivljeno zrcalo</string>
            <string language="en">curved mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gorišče</string>
            <string language="en">focal point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zrcalo</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmung des Schwerpunktes eines gebogenen 
Spiegels mit dem Gebrauch von parallelen Strahlen und Bild der 
Nachricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination du point focal d'un miroir 
incurvé avec l'utilisation des rayons parallèles et de l'image de 
l'objet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando o ponto focal de um espelho curvado 
com o uso de raios paralelos e de imagem do objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione del punto focale di uno specchio 
curvo con l'uso dei raggi paralleli e dell'immagine dell'oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός του σημείου εστίασης ενός κυρτού καθρέφτη
με τη χρήση των παράλληλων ακτίνων και της εικόνας του 
αντικειμένου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación del punto focal de un espejo 
curvado con el uso de rayos paralelos y de la imagen del objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gebogener Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerpunkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir incurvé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>
          </keyword>
